dc_title_s: Highway Reference Posts Non Measured: Minnesota
dc_description_s: Reference posts (often called Mile Post or Mile Markers) are green numbered signs along the side of a highway roughly a mile apart for traveler reference.    **MnDOT LRS data files will come in two versions, one ending in non-measured which does not contain calibrations.  These files are good for reference material.  The other version without the non-measured has calibrations and can be used to run linear events or extract measures.  These versions require contacting MnDOT to obtain.  The calibrations in them are not compatible with older Transportation Information System/GIS BaseMap measures. **
